invention-title: Fuel oil and steam hybrid engine

abstract.p: Fuel oil and water are utilized to generate powerful power, so that environmental protection and energy conservation are achieved, in the fuel oil power aspect, water electrolysis oxygen is utilized to enhance the oxygen content of gas in the combustion-supporting chamber, the combustion temperature is increased by 40/100, fuel is fully combusted, fuel consumption is reduced, and energy conservation and environmental protection are achieved; energy conservation and environmental protection are realized again by using electrolytic hydrogen of which the heat is released by 3 times of fuel oil as fuel, and the heat discharged by the fuel oil machine is extracted to be converted into steam power, so that special energy conservation and environmental protection are realized; in addition to the above performance, when the machine is matched with other equipment and fuel is wasted due to influence of external factors, the machine has energy exchange, storage and transfer functions in the structure of the machine, so that the problem of waste is solved, for example, the machine is applied to a transport vehicle and turns around when encountering muddy and bumpy roads; when a red light or a pause condition is encountered, the energy is automatically converted into energy to be stored and released when the vehicle is driven again, and the two kinds of conditions really achieve that the oil consumption per hundred kilometers is almost the same regardless of expressways, muddy roads, low-speed roads and the like. Compared with other engines, the engine has complete functions, can save energy by more than 50/100, and is suitable for generators, automobiles, steamships and the like.

本发明利用燃油和水产生强大的动力从而实现了环保与节能、燃油动力方面利用水电解氧增强助燃室气体含氧量燃烧温度上升40/100燃料充分燃烧从而降低燃料消耗实现节能与环保、利用热量释放3倍于燃油的电解氢作燃料再次实现节能与环保、提取燃油机排放热量转蒸汽动力实现了特效节能与环保，本机除上述性能外在与其它设备搭配方面当受外因素影响造成燃料浪费时自身结构内具备能量互换、储存、转移功能解决了浪费问题、如运用于运输车辆上当遇到道路泥泞坑洼掉头拐弯、上下山坡堵车慢行等其结构内自动转换为能量互换功能、当遇到红灯及暂停状况时它自动转换为能量储存待再行驶时释放、两类状况真正实现无论高速公路、泥泞道路、低速公路等百公里耗油量几乎相同，因功能齐全燃料消耗与其它发动机相比可节能50/100以上它适用于发电机、汽车、轮船等。
